title: Refraction, surface tension, and speed of sound: Refractive index (Na D-line)

components.name: 1-butyl-3-methylimidazolium tetrafluoroborate
sample: 0.02 water mass %;0.01 halide impurity mass %(dried by vacuum heating)

ref.title: Volumetric properties, viscosities and refractive indices of binary liquid mixtures of tetrafluoroborate-based ionic liquids with methanol at several temperatures
ref.full: Vercher, E.; Llopis, F. J.; Gonzalez-Alfaro, V.; Miguel, P. J.; Orchilles, V.; Martinez-Andreu, A. (2015) J. Chem. Thermodyn. 90, 174-184.
